model module¶

model.trainModel(trainingdata, testdata, target, learningrate, batchsize, epochs, l2rate, dropoutrate, earlyStoppingPatience, layersize, modelName='2022-06-28')¶

Trains predictive model

Parameters

  • trainingdata (pandas.DataFrame) – Dataset to learn from

  • testdata (pandas.DataFrame) – Dataset to validate with

  • target (str) – Name of column to predict

  • learningrate (float) – Learning rate of model

  • batchsize (int) – Batch size for gradient descent

  • epochs (int) – Maximum number of epochs

  • l2rate (float) – L2 regularization rate

  • dropoutrate (float) – Dropout regularization rate

  • earlyStoppingPatience (int) – Number of epochs without improvement to allow before stopping

  • layersize (int) – Number of nodes in each model layer

  • modelName (str) – Unique identifier to write to file names, defaults to current date as “yyyy-mm-dd”

Stock-Evaluator
